Ótimo para estressar um estressado rsrs

A very slick and traumatic first person shooter. I find myself either, having great games and enjoying myself or being curb stomped by people who have 1 game on their account but are only just in matchmaking.
Playing with a premade is definitely the way too as some people who join the game and queue with randomers seem to forget that people have different skill levels. And when they encounter someone they see as less (which let's face it is probably all of the time) they make sure to let you know.

So the community kind of sucks. But the gameplay is very satisfying and when you do get those close games and rare nice people it is very enjoyable. Just i'm not sure if the other times outweigh it... As i seem to keep coming back for more, despite the abuse, i guess i must recommend it.
